name: controller game
description:
due to my laziness, I have not gotten to the making levels part of this game I will add levels some time but for now it's just a random project in progress

Playstation controller:

left stick = left, right, down a ladder, up a ladder, jump

X = jump

Circle = let go of ladder

Triangle = save position

Square = load saved position

Xbox controller:

left stick = left, right, down a ladder, up a ladder, jump

A = jump

B = let go of the ladder

Y = save position

X = load saved position

Both controllers

left stick to move left/right, jump, up or down ladders

press down on left stick to let go of ladders

DANGEROUS CONTROLS

Playstation:

down on Dpad + square resets your progress ENTIRELY (use if you fall through the map and there are no spikes to land on to reset you back to your last checkpoint before pressing this bind please try just pressing square if that doesn't work then you may press this bind)

Xbox:

down on Dpad + X resets your progress ENTIRELY (use if you fall through the map and there are no spikes to land on to reset you back to your last checkpoint before pressing this bind please try just pressing X if that doesn't work then you may press this bind)
